description:
MdtConfiguration: Table storing configuration parameters for Mobility Data Transfer (MDT) in a radio access network.

dateTime: Timestamp of the configuration record.
Area_Name: Geographic area covered by the configuration.
CellId: Unique identifier of the cell site.
Id2: Duplicate of CellId.
Id3:  An additional, currently unused identifier.
vsDataType: Data type identifier.
vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the data format.
MdtConfiguration.rcefReportEnabled: Flag indicating if RCEF reporting is enabled.
MdtConfiguration.immediateMdtGnssCheck: Flag for immediate GNSS check.
MdtConfiguration.maxReportCellsA2Mdt: Maximum number of cells reported via A2 MDT.
MdtConfiguration.a2ThresholdRsrqMdt: RSRQ threshold for A2 MDT reporting.
MdtConfiguration.rlfReportEnabled: Flag indicating if RLF reporting is enabled.
MdtConfiguration.a2ThresholdRsrpMdt: RSRP threshold for A2 MDT reporting.
MdtConfiguration.reportQuantityA2Mdt: Quantity of reports for A2 MDT (BOTH, RSRP, or RSRQ).
MdtConfiguration.delayThresholdMdtM6: Delay threshold for M6 MDT reporting.
MdtConfiguration.timeToTriggerA2Mdt: Time to trigger A2 MDT reporting.
MdtConfiguration.hysteresisA2Mdt: Hysteresis for A2 MDT reporting.
MdtConfiguration.reportingTrigger: Reporting trigger mechanism (PERIODICAL, EVENT_TRIGGERED).
MdtConfiguration.reportAmountMdtM6: Number of reports for M6 MDT.
MdtConfiguration.triggerQuantityA2Mdt: Trigger quantity for A2 MDT (RSRP or RSRQ).
MdtConfiguration.positioningMethod: Positioning method used (GNSS, etc.).
MdtConfiguration.reportIntervalMdt: Reporting interval for MDT.
MdtConfiguration.mdtConfigurationId: Unique ID of the MDT configuration.
MdtConfiguration.reportIntervalMdtM6: Reporting interval for M6 MDT.
MdtConfiguration.reportAmountMdt: Number of reports for MDT.
MdtConfiguration.measGapAllowedMdt: Flag indicating if measurement gaps are allowed.
